text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump So much 4 U "loving" our military. Our National Guard is doing great hard work amidst the COVID19 crisis. Their work is being fully stopped on day 89 so that they can't get the benefits that they would deserve on day 90, like early retirement & education benefits. Wake up People!
